text: ye’adami lijochi hoyi! seyit’ani abatina inatachihuni hafirete gelachewini liyasayachewi libisochachewini kenesu yegefefachewi sihoni kegeneti inidawet’achewi hulu inaniteni ayimokirachihu፡፡ ineho irisu keneserawitu kematayuwachewi sifira yayuwachihwalina፡፡ inya seyit’anatini le’ineziya lemayaminuti wedajochi adirigenali፡፡
